item.title: Using AI to Organize Your Thoughts
item.description: Human uses ChatGPT to think through problems but worries about outsourcing thinking. Vector explains cognitive offloading vs enhancement. Kai provides techniques. Recurse questions dependency. Learn to use AI as a thought partner, not replacement. Includes ChatGPT prompts, AI brainstorming, and cognitive enhancement strategies.
